title: RtReleaseITCase failure on Rultor
body:
When building on Rultor, we sometimes get an error from `RtReleaseITCase`. It probably occurs because of a concurrent build, or a previous build that failed to execute cleanly.

I think the best way to deal with this is to use a randomized name for the tags in both the `setUp()` method and the actual test. A hard-coded name may already exist on the test repo that we're targetting.

```
Results :

Failed tests:
  RtReleaseITCase.canEditRelease:97 HTTP response status is not equal to 200:
422 Unprocessable Entity [https://api.github.com/repos/jcabi-github-test/test/releases/216164]
```
